dc:title: Southern Hospitality
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Retells the indignity and jailing that an interracial group endured in Shreveport, Louisiana.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 239 1954-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
